name: Disgaea Dimension 2
description:
Disgaea Dimension 2 is a RPG game developed by Nippon Ichi Software. It came out on 20-03-2013. NIS America published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Disgaea Dimension 2 is available on PlayStation 3.
Shogo Kazakai produced the game. It was directed by Takehisa Matsuda. It was scored by Tenpei Sato.
